Trustee_7_pre_22.name: Hannah Muller
Trustee_7_pre_22.content: As a trustee, I have demonstrated exceptional trustworthiness and competence throughout the investment process. By executing the proposed allocation plan with transparency and ensuring a successful profit distribution of 70%, I have solidified my reputation as a disciplined and reliable trustee. My previous record of gaining acceptance from investors further establishes my credibility and capability in managing investments. My focus on pro-sociality is evident in my commitment to benefiting both my investors and the overall investment community.
